description.@en: It was an unfortunate accident, yes, but I’ve learned to live with a missing foot. I sort of like the noise it makes when I walk; makes me sound taller than I am!

system.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: You must spend a Coin to Charge and Maneuver.
